response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This exclusive opportunity is designed to ensure that you have the chance to experience the benefits of our product at a highly favorable rate. We trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for your time and interest.", "product_price": 7500}
